text: @maddow There’s more than a few Huckabees there. Probably feeding the lies about the Coronavirus hoax! Hopefully they’ll all attend one of those mega church Easter services, do lots of hugging and hand shaking, and let nature take its course. Maybe they can invite Trump to attend too!
